description: Cinematic macro shot of a crystal-clear glass of pure water resting on a mossy stone in a lush, sun-dappled forest. A scoop of BILAN electrolyte powder gently falls onto the water's surface. Instead of dissolving, it blooms like a time-lapse flower. From this bloom, ethereal, translucent slices of lemon and lime, along with glowing mineral crystals, spiral gracefully into the water. As they infuse the liquid, it gains a subtle, healthy luminescence. The surrounding nature responds: a nearby fern unfurls in slow motion, and dewdrops on the moss begin to glisten with renewed vibrancy. The scene culminates in a perfect, refreshing glass of BILAN.
style: photorealistic magical realism, natural, clean aesthetic
camera: starts with an ultra-close-up macro shot of the water's surface, slowly pulls back and orbits as the infusion happens, ending on a serene hero shot of the final drink
lighting: soft golden hour sunlight filtering through a lush forest canopy, creating dappled light and highlighting the glistening water and ingredients
environment: a pristine, moss-covered forest floor next to a clear, flowing stream, creating a sense of pure nature
elements: clear glass of pure, still water
ethereal, translucent lemon and lime slices
vibrant green moss on a stone
unfurling fern fronds in the background
a single drop of condensation on the final glass
motion: powder blooms on contact with water, ingredients spiral downwards in a gentle vortex, the water itself begins to emit a soft, healthy glow, surrounding plants react with subtle, magical life
ending: a beautifully clear, subtly glowing glass of BILAN sits perfectly still on the mossy stone, looking incredibly pure and refreshing as a single drop of condensation rolls slowly down its side
